items.title: Who We are?
items.description: Green River Intelligence and Technology is a company founded in 2010, with a focus on the market for advanced intelligence solutions and high technology, data protection and privacy solutions for Internet services, and tracking of cryptocurrency operations.

items.title:
Helping You
Grow In Every Stage.
items.description: The solutions exclusively marketed by the company aim to serve businesses and public agencies, defense and public security agencies, internal intelligence and counterintelligence agencies, legal instances, in physical and cyberspace environments.

section_subtitle.title:
Intelligence Strategy
Tatics, Privacy and Data Security

items.title: Scope Box
items.subtitle: The Most Advanced Big Data Browser.
items.description: Data-driven analysis software helps intelligence agencies, public security institutions, and defense in the fight against terrorism, corruption, and other threats. It is a Big Data Analysis tool for collecting large volumes of data from various sources (SQL and NoSQL databases), processing, creating connections allowing analysis of content, metadata, temporal lapses, among others. It allows merging multiple different sources and transforming heterogeneous data structures into a flexible and analyzable format within the system. Scope Box meets LGPD requirements.

items.title: COINØMON
items.subtitle: Follow the Money and Uncover the Story Behind.
items.description: COINØMON is a specialized platform that provides forensic analysis on various blockchains of different cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Litecoin, Dash, Zcash, and Bitcoin Cash, among others. COINØMON allows for tracking and tracing of cryptocurrency transactions, identifying the entire chain of transactions and operations, correlating addresses and wallets, clusters, monitoring addresses with activity alarms; analysis and evaluation of ransomware, identification of parties involved, and assessment of the value of illicit activities, among others.

items.title: Plath
items.subtitle: COMINT, ELINT, C-ECM, and EW Solutions
items.description: Plath's future-oriented intelligence systems provide substantial data as the foundation for successful early crisis prevention, improved protection of people, borders, and counter-terrorism efforts. Precise sensors and powerful software form the core of optimized integrated systems, enabling faster and more reliable processing of complex data. Whether on land, at sea, in the air, or in cyberspace, PLATH systems meet your needs and can be adapted to various platforms and environmental conditions. Their main goal is to ensure security.

items.title: Snowpack
items.subtitle: How to Become Invisible on the Internet
items.description:
A Better Tor! Safer! More Efficient! More Reliable!
Snowpack combines privacy and internet security in a unique overlay network to make you (and your data) invisible. Snowpack is based on the idea that in order to attack content, one must be able to identify it. Snowpack introduces a new approach by fragmenting a message, making these fragments anonymous and circulating them in anonymously created circuits. This makes it impossible for an attacker to gather all the fragments, making your browsing safer.
